DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether bazedoxifene/conjugated estrogens combinations are effective for the prevention of endometrial hyperplasia and for the prevention of osteoporosis in postmenopausal women.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Bazedoxifene/Conjugated Estrogens Combinations In Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy, postmenopausal women, aged 40 to less than 65 years Intact uterus At least 12 months of spontaneous amenorrhea, OR 6 months spontaneous amenorrhea with folliclestimulating hormone (FSH) levels > 40 mIU/mL. Use of oral estrogen, progestin, androgen, or SERMcontaining drug products within 8 weeks before screening (12 weeks for the osteoporosis substudy) A history or active presence of clinically important medical disease Malabsorption disorders
